discipline.name: Celerity
discipline.overview: Celerity allows the kindred to defy the constraints of the human body. Dodging, running and general movements outside of the natural ability come easily when using these powers. With this, kindred become even stronger predators or strategists, able to make moves or think faster than most can.

level1.name: Cat's Grace
level1.notes: Does not work on objects that cannot support their weight

level1.name: Fluent Swiftness
level1.effect: Reroll Blood Surge on a Dexterity or Celerity test

level1.name: Rapid Reflexes
level1.notes: This power also prevents them from taking a penalty when they have no cover during a firefight

level2.name: Fleetness
level2.effect: Add Celerity rating for non-combat Dexterity test or defending
level2.notes: This may be used once per turn when defending with associated pools

level2.name: Rush Job
level2.effect: Perform a Skill-related task that would take a long time in mere seconds
level2.notes: This power does not speed up attacks or defenses
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 72

level3.name: Blink
level3.effect: Closes the distance as if teleporting
level3.notes: The user moves in a straight line and may need to make checks against difficult terrain

level3.name: Traversal
level3.effect: Move fast enough to move up vertical surfaces or liquid surfaces
level3.notes: The Storyteller should inform the user beforehand if the target is too far away

level3.name: Weaving
level3.effect: Remove the penalty from dodging multiple ranged opponents
level3.notes: The user can all add their Celerity rating to ranged dodging attempts
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 72

level4.name: Blurred Momentum
level4.effect: Attacks against the user with fewer successes than their Celerity rating miss
level4.duration: Until the user lets it lapse
level4.notes: This works against powers that do not allow defense tests
level4.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 72

level4.name: Draught of Elegance
level4.effect: Turn their vitae into a Celerity boost for others
level4.duration: One Night; for drinkers until the vampire's next feeding or Hunger 5
level4.notes: Each drinker must take one Rouse Checks worth

level4.name: Unerring Aim
level4.effect: The world slows down to a crawl
level4.notes: Those with Celerity 5 may nullify this power with a Rouse Check and defend

level4.name: Unseen Strike
level4.effect: Disappear then reappear to surprise attack an enemy
level4.notes: If the test is won, the attack is treated as a surprise attack. Else it follows the same attack/movement rules as Blink
level4.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 73

level5.name: Lightning Strike
level5.notes: Those with Celerity 5 may nullify this power with a Rouse Check and defend

level5.name: Split Second
level5.effect: Alter the events given by Storyteller in a current scene within reason
level5.duration: One action, as determined by ST
level5.notes: The action should be reasonable and accomplished within a few seconds in real-time
